scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run start --prefix frontend-web" "backend/venv/bin/python backend/manage.py runserver" "npx nodemon --watch frontend-desktop -e py --exec frontend-desktop/venv/bin/python frontend-desktop/main.py"
scripts.dev:web: concurrently "npm run start --prefix frontend-web" "backend/venv/bin/python backend/manage.py runserver"
